author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a class (due to Chris Seez) which finds neighbours of a silicon cell - it will be integrated with HGCalTopology once fully debugged

#### PR validation:

The original code is tested by Chris. The CMSSW adaptation will be tested once integrated with HGCalTopology

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx365F Add a class which finds neighbours of a silicon cell - it will be integrated to HGCalTopology once fully debugged
